distributeBorrower_SIGH(address,address).details: Borrowers will not begin to accrue until after the first interaction with the protocol.

params.borrower: The address of the borrower to distribute Gsigh to
params.currentMarket: The market in which the borrower is interacting
The market in which the supplier is interacting
params.supplier: The address of the supplier to distribute SIGH to

params.currentMarket: The market whose borrow index to update

params.SIGHSpeed_: The amount of SIGH wei per block to distribute

params.currentMarket: The market whose supply index to update

distributeBorrower_SIGH(address,address).notice: Calculate SIGH accrued by a borrower and possibly transfer it to them

distributeSupplier_SIGH(address,address).notice: Calculate SIGH accrued by a supplier and possibly transfer it to them

refreshSIGHSpeeds().notice: Recalculate and update SIGH speeds for all SIGH markets

updateSIGHBorrowIndex(address).notice: Accrue SIGH to the market by updating the borrow index

updateSIGHSpeed(uint256).notice: Set the amount of SIGH distributed per block

updateSIGHSupplyIndex(address).notice: Accrue SIGH to the market by updating the supply index
